samples.question: Are you good at telling jokes?
samples.transcript: Well, to be honest, I am not a serious person. I would say like I am a humorous person. So I was, I always tell some jokes to my friends and they always laugh. So I am going to consider myself as you know, I am good at telling a jokes.

samples.question: Do you like watching funny TV shows?
samples.transcript: Yeah, I do love to watch comedy TV shows. cause you know, if you are working for the whole day, it is very, very, good way to chill out. Like, you know, to watch some comedy shows, to watch some, comedy videos, probably just like on YouTube. it is one way to have a good time.

samples.question: What kind of indoor games do children like to play in your country?
samples.transcript: Well I have never thought that. And I would say that is an interesting question. But here in the Philippines, a lot of children usually play some, I would say not just in the Philippines, but all over the world. I am going to consider this as an indoor game because you have to play this inside of your house. So a lot of people, a lot of children love to play electronic games, mobile games, computer games. And, I would say that that is one of, the major addiction among today's children and teenagers, especially in my country. Do you think, I mean you have talked about the kind of the games like the computer games, do you think there are any benefits of children playing computer games? well, to be honest I would say yes, it has some benefits. Because if you are playing some games, whatever the kind of game that you are playing, it might help you to, you know, like to enhance your ability to compete with other people. So, you know, it has a lot of benefits just like it can help you to compete with other people and enhance a lot of abilities and skills that you need to have or you might need it when you grow up. So those are just the benefits that I can think of right now.

samples.question: What do you think of the differences between boys games and girls games?
samples.transcript: That is an interesting question. I would say boys games are really like they love playing games that involves violence. I mean, you know, a lot of people are in, a lot of boys especially are into playing some violence or some games that promotes violence. But for female, I would say, most of the games that they are playing are just games that, can help them to be more like, or to learn more, to gain more knowledge. So mostly females love to play those games. That is very, very educational.

samples.question: Do you think that there are, do you think it is a good idea for adults to play games?
samples.transcript: Yes, I do think so. it is a good idea for adults to play games. Because, first of all, a lot of adults are working hard. they are studying hard, they are working hard. They might be so busy for the whole day. So if they are going to have some time to play games, to you know, relax themselves, to chill out, it will be you know, a kind of thing to recharge themselves. I mean like recharge their batteries. Yes, they might be so exhausted working for the whole day. So playing game is one way to you know, like whale of time, have a whale of time. Right.
samples.transcript_original: Um, yes, I do think so. It's a good idea for adults to play games. Because, um, first of all, a lot of adults are working hard. samples.question: Why do some adults prefer not to play games?
samples.transcript: Well, to my knowledge, some adults do not like to play games because they think it is one way or it is one factor that, or they consider those people who are playing games as an immature person or immature people. So they do not want to be called as an immature person. that is why we do not like to play games. But the thing is, just like, as I have mentioned earlier, playing games is not something that, or playing games is something that can entertain us and have a blast. So there is nothing wrong with playing games, in my knowledge.

samples.question: He, after he began speaking, he started to say, oh, who you played it with?
samples.transcript: Da, da, da, da, da. He just read the bullet point. Rephrase it, make it into a natural connector or signpost. For example, so when it comes to who I played with, well, I used to play with da, da, da, da, da. Right? other thing, I think he does have a nice technique actually, which is he uses a pause before he answers. And even uses kind of time gainers. You know, oh, that is a good question. samples.question: What helps you to relax?
samples.transcript: Going for an hour to the gym or taking a stroll in the park near my home are the two ways I decompress when I am feeling tense.

samples.question: How often do you write on paper?
samples.transcript: I frequently write on paper. Whether it is notes on a post-it to remind me of an important thought or a schedule, or notes for English. English. I am constantly jotting down ideas at least three, four times a day.

samples.question: If you had to write a book would you choose to do it on paper or with a computer?

samples.question: Have the way people write changed because of the computer?
